data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Central Equatoria.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Central Equatoria, South Sudan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Central Equatoria, South Sudan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 34 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Central Equatoria, South Sudan.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Central Equatoria, South Sudan.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, help the 19,116 believers in Central Equatoria to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Arab, Sudanese people might believe through him.
Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Central Equatoria to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Central Equatoria prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Central Equatoria, South Sudan.
